overview: CJ Dulberger is President and CEO of Imagination Inc. (imagincorp.com), a next-generation integrated advertising agency that specializes in website development, social media campaigns, Internet marketing, search engine optimization, and mobile apps development. He also founded World Coffee Network (WorldCoffee.net), a coffee and tea e-commerce marketplace. CJ has almost a decade of experience working in the private sector, government agencies, nonprofit organizations, and academic institutions. He has IT business experience for such organizations such as Wells Fargo, Florida State College at Jacksonville, and Robert Half Technology. He resides in Jacksonville, Florida with his fiancee, Jennifer, and their two weimaraners.
